text: Nemesis is an evil creature found in the Resident Evil franchise. ==Fictional character biography== Nemesis is a monster created by the Umbrella Corporation. ==2002-2016 movie series== Matt Addison has been taken by Umbrella Corporation to become Project Nemesis. In Resident Evil: Apocalypse (2004), Nemesis appears as a villain in the movie. ==Reception== The creature has received great reviews. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:Resident Evil characters Category:Video game antagonists Category:Video game bosses
title: Nemesis (Resident Evil)
